subtitles:
176640 179200 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
179280 182238 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

183040 185600 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
199240 201629 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

209760 212479 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

212560 216235 If you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

216320 221348 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

221440 224750 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

233000 236037 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

238080 242198 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
242280 243793 We'll get you out of here.

243880 248351 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
265000 267036 Get it off! Get it off!

270520 273592 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

281920 284992 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

961760 964513 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

972320 974788 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1002280 1004430 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1033200 1037751 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1039840 1044834 The man goes to leave and the barman says
"Oi! You can't leave that lying there."
1044920 1048799 He says "No, it's not a lion. It's a giraffe".
1058960 1061758 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1068280 1071636 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1076040 1082195 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1082280 1085875 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm...

1110400 1116396 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1116480 1120473 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1121320 1123959 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1124040 1128556 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1132280 1134999 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1137520 1139909 There was something in the blood.

1141320 1146075 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1152920 1155514 And that's when the exodus started.

1159560 1163075 there were reports of Infection
in Paris and New York.
1165360 1168158 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1171000 1173833 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1176360 1180273 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1180360 1184478 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1185880 1188838 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1189440 1193433 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1211080 1214914 Look, I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it. OK?
1215000 1217468 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1231640 1235872 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1238280 1242193 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1246200 1249636 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1263720 1266757 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1424400 1428188 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1434400 1438712 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1441240 1446360 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1446960 1449235 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1449320 1452517 even though cash was completely useless.
1454000 1456992 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1462320 1464550 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1466640 1468870 I remember the ground was soft.

1470760 1474958 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1475040 1478828 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1478920 1482708 Somewhere in the crowd
there were Infected. It spread fast.

1482800 1485997 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1487560 1490518 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1490600 1492875 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1495080 1499835 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1499920 1503629 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1517160 1522109 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1524680 1527399 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1527480 1530677 No, we'll all sleep in the same room. It's safer.
1629160 1631355 Give me a drink of that, will ya?

1673960 1676793 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1676880 1678996 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1682120 1684918 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1721240 1723231 Do you have any clothes here?

1726200 1729715 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1729800 1733315 More Infected will be coming.
They always do.

1760920 1763798 (Jim) How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1763880 1767634 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1767720 1772874 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1772960 1777192 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1777280 1782195 It might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1782280 1787479 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1787560 1791599 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1791680 1795958 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world orjust fall in love and fuck?
1798520 1800988 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1857320 1860312 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1860400 1863358 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1880560 1882551 Now I do need a break.

1901520 1906594 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1907760 1911833 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1914040 1916190 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1916280 1921149 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

1926640 1929552 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2003760 2006638 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2006720 2008915 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2040960 2043918 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2058560 2060755 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2060840 2063752 Why don't you all sit down and...
2063840 2066673 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2066760 2069149 We've got Mum's créme de menthe.

2079680 2082558 - (Frank) Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2082640 2085393 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2107240 2110198 I know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2137840 2143198 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2144800 2146950 You'll have to use the bucket.
2153240 2155754 Have to empty it each morning.

2155840 2159355 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2161160 2164152 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2176960 2179235 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2214440 2217989 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2219080 2221799 Probably need us more than we need them.

2232640 2237111 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2237200 2240795 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2245080 2248470 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2263880 2266997 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2268800 2272634 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2303520 2305511 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2305600 2309559 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2309640 2312712 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2328520 2332593 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2332680 2336275 Saw it on TV once, but I can't make it work.
2351680 2354672 Jim, we're not going to be able to stay here.

2363240 2366835 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2366920 2371311 (man on radio) Salvation is here.
The answer to Infection is here.
2371400 2374278 If you can hear this, you're not alone.

2374360 2378672 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2378760 2380876 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2384200 2388591 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2392040 2395794 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now itjust repeats.

2395880 2398155 - It's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2398240 2401038 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2404640 2409236 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2414880 2420716 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2420800 2423837 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's OK. It's the truth.
2423920 2426309 I can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2426400 2430188 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2432000 2436118 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2436200 2439556 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection...

2439640 2443758 There is no answer!
It's already done all the damage it can!

2443840 2446559 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2446640 2450553 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2454840 2460312 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2463640 2468714 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2469400 2471391 So we have to try and get there.

2484960 2488555 Just so you know,
I don't take cheques or credit cards.

2515960 2518838 - (Frank) What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2518920 2523948 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2540840 2543229 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2544080 2547311 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2547400 2551598 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2551680 2554478 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2588680 2590989 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2591080 2594277 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2596680 2598750 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2612760 2616150 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2646840 2650958 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2651040 2654157 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2660360 2665275 - (Selena) Don't look at them! Don't look!
- (Jim) I can see them! They're coming!

2675720 2678518 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2691360 2693715 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2767080 2770516 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2770600 2772352 I think you can eat that raw.

2779720 2784032 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2788560 2792030 Now, single malt,
16-year-old, dark, full flavour.
2799800 2802917 Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth.
2855560 2858518 Either we do this now or we're walking.

2908600 2911160 (quietly) Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3005280 3007953 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3080800 3083678 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3084480 3087153 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3145960 3149509 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3149600 3153593 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3154600 3158275 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3168800 3170995 I was thinking I was wrong.

3181960 3186272 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3187600 3190910 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3193480 3196950 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.

3219880 3223714 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3250880 3253440 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3269560 3273269 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3273360 3277478 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3280080 3282548 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3282640 3286189 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3286280 3288430 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3300400 3302994 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3304040 3307874 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3381640 3384313 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3437360 3440716 - Did I miss breakfast?
- (Selena) You'll sleep through anything.

3440800 3445590 - (Jim) Did you have a fry-up?
- (Frank) We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!

3469160 3473472 (radio) Our location
is the 42nd blockade, the M602,
3518400 3521631 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3523400 3525630 No fire crews to put it out.

3651240 3655074 I don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3655160 3658152 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3664720 3669350 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3781000 3783798 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3783880 3786269 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
3846920 3849480 (man) Three survivors. One male, two female.
3849560 3852757 I repeat, one male, two female.

3914920 3919596 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
3919680 3921989 So you can all have a shower.
3922080 3925277 You look like you need one. Please.

3944400 3949394 It ain't funny. I got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris!
3957840 3960877 She's lost her dad, Jim. That's how she is.

3972680 3976116 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

3979800 3984590 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

3984680 3988434 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
3989680 3991989 I want her to be OK.
3993520 3995590 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
3995680 3998353 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4036840 4040196 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4040280 4046150 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4048480 4052473 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4056800 4061112 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4061480 4064278 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4064360 4067352 The fire drove hundreds of Infected
out of Manchester.
4067440 4070398 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4080040 4085672 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4089240 4093313 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4093400 4097871 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4101000 4105710 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4105800 4108109 The belly of the house. The heart.

4108200 4113228 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4115400 4117436 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4117520 4120592 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4120680 4124559 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4127000 4129878 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4153280 4158149 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4165520 4169399 The idea was to learn something
about Infection.
4191160 4194436 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4205600 4210754 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the Infected take to starve to death.
4271760 4274991 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4282280 4284635 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4284720 4287792 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4287880 4290872 but this omelette will do just as well.

4305800 4309554 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4309640 4312916 I thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4319600 4322273 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4323080 4328313 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4328400 4332757 What a fucking disappointment.
I saw those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4332840 4335957 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.
4336040 4338759 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4338840 4342719 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4342800 4346952 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4347040 4350032 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4352040 4355999 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4356720 4359075 So if the infection wipes us all out,

4366080 4368958 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4369040 4372157 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4374920 4379914 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4382600 4386559 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since Infection.

4389240 4393597 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
Infection, the four weeks before that...

4393680 4398913 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4399000 4402470 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4410440 4413273 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4416120 4419237 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4420120 4423112 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4427040 4428996 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4478680 4482150 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4498160 4500355 I ain't never seen that in my life!

4522080 4527473 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4527560 4529676 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4531400 4536474 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4538040 4540110 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4546080 4550392 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4557800 4560712 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4560800 4564110 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4574160 4576754 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4579520 4581988 The rest of you, go with him.

4603480 4607519 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4607600 4609079 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4609160 4614109 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4621080 4624072 I killed... I killed a boy.

4635240 4639836 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4659960 4663589 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4664720 4669236 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4669320 4672073 What could I say to him?

4672160 4677154 We fight off the Infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4678040 4681715 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4681800 4687670 I moved us from the blockade, I set the radio
broadcasting and I promised them women.

4704520 4706238 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4706320 4708311 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4714200 4716077 We get in the car and we go!

4717400 4721757 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4721840 4724957 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4725040 4727634 I'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4741000 4743230 I want to give you a chance.
4746920 4749115 But I can't let them go.

4776040 4778679 (Farrell) Smithers says
"Women and semen don't mix."

4778760 4781558 And Mr Burns says
"We all know what you think, Smithers."

4781640 4784438 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4784520 4787990 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4788080 4792312 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4792400 4795551 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

4795640 4801112 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

4802120 4805999 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
4807320 4810312 Just imagine, just think about it.
4811320 4813515 How could Infection cross the oceans?

4813600 4817718 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

4817800 4820394 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

4820480 4824314 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

4828440 4831876 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

4840280 4844478 "There is no Infection.
It's just people killing people." He's insane!

4889120 4892112 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

4893160 4898075 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

4898160 4901914 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
4905600 4907591 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

4931560 4934836 (Farrell) Come on then,
you fucking pansies. Do me first.
4934920 4937309 (Jones) No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

4937400 4940312 - (Farrell) So you're gonna stick me?
- (Jones) Shoot 'em!

4943040 4945952 (Farrell) Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

4946040 4947871 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

4947960 4951270 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

4960200 4963988 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

4964080 4968073 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
4969280 4971999 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

4974400 4977472 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

4986840 4988671 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5003520 5006830 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5044280 5048068 (West) The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5048160 5051596 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5051680 5054114 which she certainly has no use for.
5055080 5056832 You can't do it to Hannah.

5056920 5060469 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5073440 5076113 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5076200 5079397 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5097400 5101359 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5103160 5106709 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5106800 5110793 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5133600 5136353 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5158480 5162268 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5162360 5164430 Are you trying to kill me?
5166760 5169194 I'm making you not care. OK?
5180680 5183240 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5188840 5191308 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5411960 5414315 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5415320 5419108 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5421760 5424274 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5436920 5439309 I think they're having an effect.

5454240 5456993 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5457720 5460678 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5460760 5462671 Is that the way it works?

5466080 5469993 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5488160 5491152 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5491240 5493959 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5515120 5520433 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5528080 5531311 Don'tjust stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5552840 5555673 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5581160 5584755 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

5756160 5760358 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets!

5821160 5825756 It's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

5825840 5830118 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
5830200 5832430 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
5894160 5896549 That was longer than a heartbeat.
5910240 5913630 Listen. Listen. It's not all fucked.
5919160 5921549 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

5921640 5924837 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
5933000 5936436 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
5936520 5938511 But I thought he was biting you.
5938600 5941160 I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
5943400 5945436 We have to get out of here. Come on!
6039720 6042029 Come on, Jim, breathe! Fucking breathe!
6131920 6134480 You looked all right in this, you know.

6155240 6158437 - I can't hear anything!
- I told you, I heard it!
6211640 6214438 Do you think he saw us this time?
